___digest.description: The original `digest` from the suspended payment creation transaction. This is sha256 hash of `proof` string. It is replicated here so that the relatively expensive hashing operation can be delegated to a server without ledger history and the server with ledger history only has to do a quick comparison of the old digest with the new digest.

___suspensionSequence.description: The [account sequence number](#account-sequence-number) of the [Suspended Payment Creation](#suspended-payment-creation) transaction for the suspended payment to execute.

___method.description: The method for verifying the proof; only method `1` is supported.

___owner.description: The address of the owner of the suspended payment to execute.

___proof.description: A value that produces the digest when hashed. It must be 32 charaters long and contain only 8-bit characters.
